in relation to comparison districts (-0.122 to -0.133) from 1999–2002 (48). Overall 
stunting decreased from 59% to 43% in IMCI districts versus 51% to 40% in comparison 
districts. Improvement in underweight was also seen in IMCI districts (-0.071 to -0.057) as 
compared to non-IMCI districts (-0.136 to -0.166). Corresponding percentage changes for 
underweight were 30%–23% in IMCI districts versus 27%–10% in comparison districts
